text: Melinda Clarke (b. April 24, 1969) is an American actress who is known for being on television. She has, however, starred in some movies. She is best known for playing Fiona in Days of Our Lives. She also played Amanda in Nikita. Clarke was born in California. Her father is actor John Clarke, who also starred in Days of Our Lives. title: Melinda Clarke
